name: ALPHA-MD
description: Best WhatsApp bot developed by keithkeizzah

PREFIX.description: Choose your prefix for the bot

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Automatically read your contact status (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Automatically download your contact status and send it to you (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

PM_PERMIT.description: Prevent other users from using your bot in PM (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

BOT_NAME.description: Set a name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Add one or many links for your bot menu (e.g., url1,url2,url3...)

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Set to 'yes' for public mode or 'no' for private mode

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your session ID, the code you receive after scanning the QR code

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your number (don't include '+' and use your area code; e.g., '228' for Togo)

WARN_COUNT.description: Limit of warnings for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Set 'yes' if you want a starting bot message, otherwise set 'no'

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 for online, 2 for typing, 3 for recording, or leave blank for real state

AUTO_REACTION.description: Automatically react to received messages (set to 'on' to enable or 'off' to disable)

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Turn this 'on' if you want the bot to automatically read incoming messages; use 'off' to disable

BLOCK_ALL.description: Turn this 'on' to automatically block anyone who sends you a message; use 'off' to disable

CHAT_BOT.description: Set to 'on' if you want the bot to respond to user messages automatically; use 'off' to disable

ANTICALL.description: Automatically decline incoming calls (type 'on' to activate or 'off' to deactivate)

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: Enable anti-delete message feature (put 'yes' to enable, 'no' to disable)
